entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning late this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to a few rain showers or flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
